item.title: Making npcs shout over head two things?
item.dc:creator: @pastaway pastaway
item.description:
@pastaway wrote:

how would i make it say two different things… when i add two it only says the last

[QUOTE]
if (npcs[i].npcType == 9051){ //Azzanadra
if (Misc.random2(20) <= 3) { //EX FOR TIMER: 20
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].forceChat(“Welcome To ScenemoScape!”);
npcs[i].forceChat(“Use Your Spellbook for teles :D”);
}
}[/QUOTE]
